projects.name: EEGtool
projects.desc: An EEG-signal analysis tool with GUI on Matlab. Features such as eeglab integration, video-EEG synchronization, intuitive UI, scripting support.

projects.name: meerkat
projects.desc: A note and file storing and searching app. Deploys automatically on cloud from github and uses cloud DB's. Wait few seconds for VM to boot up if you check it out.

projects.name: gazeanalysislib
projects.desc: A Matlab library and script that automates many gaze analyses to be performed on computer instead of human based video analysis. source: Widely applicable MATLAB routines for automated analysis of saccadic reaction times (Lepp√§nen et al)

projects.name: Story of Integra (+ sequel)
projects.desc: A full-scale RPG project as part of the team, on Ruby over RPG maker framework

projects.name: Sensibus.io
projects.desc: A machine-learning web-service on JS and Node.js

projects.name: My homepage
projects.desc: This site is my first React.js project. (But not last..)

projects.name: Gym session
projects.desc: A hobby project to quickly create training program on the go, JS

projects.name: Currency traffic
projects.desc: A website for personal spendings tracking on pure JS and D3.js

projects.name: ECGtool
projects.desc: ECG signal analysis tool with easy UI and features such as peak detection using algorithms or hand picking, windowed HR calculation and RSA calculation.

projects.name: pimage
projects.desc: A tool for mapping images to packetsize-port space such as network operations center monitoring screen. Sends packets to create an image.

projects.name: ldrop
projects.desc: Sensor-controller library and API with support for multiple simultaneous recorders and actuators designed to work in a psychology study with Python and Linux.
